content: Wake up, Romanian, from your deadly slumber, in which barbaric tyrants kept you so long by force! Now or never is the time for you to have a new fate, which should command respect of even your cruel enemies.
translations: ita:Svegliatevi, rumeni, dal vostro sonno mortale, in cui i tiranni barbarici vi hanno trattenuto cos√¨ a lungo con la forza!
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Abeotat1948 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
